title: Improve error message of RDP error 2825 (NLA not enabed)
author: sparerd
body_snippet:
As a user, the error that occurs when attempting to connect to a machine that requires NLA does not provide enough information. While the message indicates what is wrong, there is no suggestion of how to potentially fix the issue. Improve the error message with resolution steps and look into removing the generic "contact your sysadmin" bit - the user generally is the sysadmin.

Original error message:
`RDP disconnected!
2825 The remote computer requires Network Level Authentication, which yo...

iterations.description: This is a small, user-facing error-message improvement for a specific RDP/NLA failure and should be handled as an actionable enhancement.
